name: part_014
file: tmp_【#ひろがるホロライブDAY2】hololive 4th fes. Our Bright Parade holo＊27 stage【チラ見せ】 [pDLDcU3dWp8]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_014.mov

scenes.description: Himemori Luna performing 'Kawaikunatte Itai' (I Want to Become Cute).
Instrumental transition between songs with audience applause.
Ookami Mio and Hakui Koyori performing 'Anamal'.
Ookami Mio and Hakui Koyori hyping up the crowd after their performance.

subtitles.original: 困っちゃってイヤイヤ
subtitles.english: I'm in a bind, no way, no way

subtitles.original: 決まんないの前髪が
subtitles.english: My bangs just won't stay in place

subtitles.original: 怒っちゃってイヤイヤ
subtitles.english: I'm getting mad, no way, no way

subtitles.original: もっと可愛い子になっていたいのにな
subtitles.english: I just want to become a cuter girl

subtitles.original: あーあ！
subtitles.english: Ahh!

subtitles.original: ずっとサナギになって出直すわ
subtitles.english: I'll turn back into a pupa and start over

subtitles.original: 何でもない言いたいこと言えたことない
subtitles.english: It's nothing, I've never been able to say what I want

subtitles.original: 止めど止められないの
subtitles.english: I can't stop it, I just can't

subtitles.original: 大人しくたってまた自己嫌悪
subtitles.english: Even when I'm quiet, I'm full of self-loathing again

subtitles.original: 死にたいな ハイローサネオアワタシ
subtitles.english: I want to die, high/low, sane or me

subtitles.english: Wings buzzing, turning to ash, I don't want to endure this yet

subtitles.original: 待って香水 飛び込んでみたいから
subtitles.english: Wait, perfume, because I want to dive in

subtitles.english: I'm getting mad, how's that?

subtitles.english: I want to die, the Cinderella in front of me

subtitles.original: 気になっちゃってほらほら
subtitles.english: I'm getting curious, look, look

subtitles.original: ハロー お疲れ様 あなたどう？
subtitles.english: Hello, good job, how about you?

subtitles.original: 踊っちゃってフラフラ
subtitles.english: Dancing around, feeling dizzy

subtitles.original: もっと可愛い子になっていたいのにな
subtitles.english: I just want to become a cuter girl

subtitles.original: あーあ！
subtitles.english: Ahh!

subtitles.original: ちょっとおまじになってお日様
subtitles.english: Casting a little spell, Mr. Sun

subtitles.original: あーあ！
subtitles.english: Ahh!

subtitles.original: もっと仲良くなってそうじゃないの
subtitles.english: Let's get closer, isn't that right?

subtitles.original: あーあ！
subtitles.english: Ahh!

subtitles.english: I'll turn back into a pupa and start over

subtitles.original: 剥がれ落ちたメイク スッピンのアニマル

subtitles.original: 見苦しくてもやっちゃうのよ
subtitles.english: Even if it's unsightly, I'm gonna do it

subtitles.original: お座りとかできない 待て待てもできない
subtitles.english: I can't sit, I can't even stay

subtitles.original: 喉鳴らしていっちゃうまで
subtitles.english: Until I'm purring away

subtitles.original: さぐっとしようぜ 高まるビート
subtitles.english: Let's do it quickly, the rising beat

subtitles.original: 良いも悪いも全然しよう
subtitles.english: Let's do it all, good or bad

subtitles.original: はまってみようか 突破するゲート
subtitles.english: Shall we get hooked? Breaking through the gate

subtitles.original: 会いに行きたいわ 君だよ
subtitles.english: I want to come see you, it's you

subtitles.original: 根掘り葉掘りほどに狂いたい
subtitles.english: I want to go crazy enough to dig into everything

subtitles.original: ところ構わずどうしちゃったの
subtitles.english: What's happened, regardless of the place?

subtitles.original: 痛みすらもシェアしあえたら
subtitles.english: If we could even share the pain

subtitles.original: あたしは幸せです
subtitles.english: Then I am happy
